routines.daily: Daily: Navy blue jumper/cardigan, white polo shirt, grey/black trousers or skirt

routines.title: Attendance
routines.intro: Excellent attendance is vital for your child's progress. Our target is 96%+.
routines.report:
Report Absence: Call the school office before 9:00am on each day of absence.
Tel: 020 1234 5678
routines.note: Medical appointments should be made outside school hours where possible.

parent_partnership.intro: We believe parents are partners in their child's education. There are many ways to get involved:

opportunities.title: PTA (Parent-Teacher Association)
opportunities.description: Our active PTA organizes fundraising events and social activities throughout the year. New members always welcome!

opportunities.description: Help with reading, accompany school trips, or assist with events. All volunteers require a DBS check.

opportunities.description: Join our governing body and help shape the strategic direction of the school.
